// 锁屏 import React, { } from 'react' import {} from 'react-router-dom' import '../../assets/css/lockscreen.css' import header from '../../assets/images/header.jpg' import sleep from '../../assets/images/sleep.png' import restart from '../../assets/images/restart-line.png' import shutdown from '../../assets/images/shut-down-line.png' import questionmark from '../../assets/images/问号.png' function Lockscreen (props) { const ReturnLockscreen = () => { props.history.push('/homepage') } const ReturnSleeppage = (e) => { e.stopPropagation() props.history.push('/sleeppage') } const ReturnRestartpage = (e) => { e.stopPropagation() props.history.push('/restartpage') } const ReturnClopsetpage = (e) => { e.stopPropagation() props.history.push('/closepage') } return (
{ReturnLockscreen() }} >

Mengmeng He

Click to enter
{ ReturnSleeppage(e) }}>
Sleep
{/* */} {ReturnRestartpage(e) }}/>
Restart
{/* */} {ReturnClopsetpage(e)}} />
Close
) } export default Lockscreen
